t: THE J. M. SMUCKER COMPANY | Encyclopedia of Cleveland History | Case Western Reserve University
s: November 10, 2019 - THE J. M. SMUCKER COMPANY was founded in 1897 by Jerome Monroe Smucker in Orville, Ohio. Smucker’s is a manufacturer of jam, peanut butter, beverages, shortening, ice cream toppings, oils, and other products.
